title: HOLY FUCKING SHIT PLEASE NERF ONSLAUGHT
body: WHAT KIND OF BULLSHT FUCKERY IS THIS. THIS BULLSJIT RNG CAN GO TO HELL

replies.body: From my experience it's pretty easy

Because the only two games you've done so far were on intro difficulty.

Remember, we can see your match history.

Mb I'll try the others

Lol i enjoy it a lot, its just that the missions paired with onslaught is unfun. If they made the missions easier and kept the difficulty the same it would make it a lot fun to play. But honestly 5 ziggs or 5 sonas? Why? You will see once you get to it.

Unless there are other missions I don't know about (which is entirely possible), you don't have to play as 5 Sona's and 5 Ziggs.  The Onslaught missions I have say "play as the same character" or "play with 4 or less augments."  You can play with 5 Yasuo's with 4 augments and get all 3 missions complete at once.

Again, could be completely wrong here, but neither of those missions require you to play Ziggs or Sona specifically, they just reward you with a Sona or Ziggs item.
There is a mission. Theres also a mission to do with 2 augments or less to get an odyssey gem.
If your someone like me who loves games like cuphead then its heaven

> [{quoted}](name=mack9112,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lbfveEOY,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-09-13T17:01:14.801+0000)
>
> If your someone like me who loves games like cuphead then its heaven

Cuphead's difficulty isn't like Onslaught Odyssey's straight up BS.

Because the former actually designed their difficulty instead of just throwing shit clogging up the entire map so much so you can reach a state of being literally unable to move because the entire map is occupied with monsters, and call it "difficulty". Comparing this to Cuphead feels like an insult to the latter game imho.

Honestly it only gets clogged if 1) you're not grouping well and 2) don't have any good Yas players with the Boomerang Multi Tornadoes of Orgasmic Destruction Augments on your team
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Cool
Dude you've only played intro. Why dont you play onslaught for yourself first before assuming the difficulty is the same as cuphead.
Definitely have more than one account man....
I mean, if they turned Onslaught being any more easier, might as well play Co-op vs Ai.

Co op vs ai is a million times easier than onslaught. Ive only won like 2 times out of 30. The rng is so unbalanced. I mean it wasn't even on the pbe to begin with. They didn't even let anyone test it out.

Isn't PBE a place to test for bugs? If they made every level to be the exact same gamestyle, the mode would honestly get boring real fast.
Its not the exact same, just that the onslaught difficulty should be toned down and is worlds away from captain difficulty.

I passed captain and i can smell the intensity from Onslaught and i haven’t even tried it yet. Idk if i want to lol maybe i’ll get more sona augments before i try it. What happens in onslaught tho?
basically 3x everything in captain mode
The way I beat captain easily was by playing malphite with the taunt and ultimate augment, controlling a whole wave of people into a wall is the best support tool.

> [{quoted}](name= Jaegaer,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lbfveEOY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-09-13T10:34:32.154+0000)
>
> Its literally impossible to complete the all sona or all ziggs mission on onslaught. I get as far as kayn then shadow assassin just fucks you up along with all the other monsters.

Speaking of the Sona and Ziggs missions for Onslaught, who in the right mind requires you to bend over and handicap yourself in a mode that is already nearly impossible to win even with a proper team comp and all augments? Troll much, Riot?

Also, clear me up on this, the Ziggs mission that says "4 augs or lower", does that actually just mean "3 augs"? Because you already have an 'Innate Augment' to begin with. Is "3 player equipped augs" what it's trying to say, or does it mean "4 augs that the players can equip"? And that mission doesn't require playing Ziggs, does it? I'm confused.
4 augments you can equip. The base augment doesn't count.

> [{quoted}](name=Blade Or Soul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lbfveEOY,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2018-09-14T14:03:55.151+0000)
>
> 4 augments you can equip. The base augment doesn't count.

Thanks.

Riot learned nothing from the Star guardian disaster.

But you know what? This is what the players wanted. They want to lose over and over to RNG furasteration. When you talk about how shit the star guardian mode is you get downvoted. Odessy is no different.

This is what you all wanted so you guys can have your cake and fuck it to.
who complained about starguardian lol i thought it was a success. So far this mode has been a lot of fun so yes i will enjoy it

Honestly, I consider Star Guardian to be way better than this one. The maps seemed like they've put way more work into them, and while random and at some points lame, you didn't feel like completely getting fucked over. I mean, I've been playing Onslaught with a guy who's got into EUW Master with 80% winrate (given our augments were very uneven throughout the team) and even he's wondering what kind of bs this is. He's kiting around the whole map and there's just a bazillion monsters running behind him until he can't move out anymore.
Captain was easy, for me and especially for him, but Onslaught was just about who's can kite for the longest time before you die anyways.

honestly, i like odyssey a lot, tonights been a rough night lost some captain matches which triggered me as i hadnt lost a single match until a few hours ago.... gotta be honest it takes a lot to not be toxic with some of these people i want to strangle them, everyone and their mum wants to use ziggs which BTW ZIGGS SUCKS UNLESS YOUR RUNNING THE RIGHT AUGMENTS STOP USING HIM WITHOUT HAVING YOUR CRAP!

every game ive lost has had either 2+ ziggs or ziggs + sona or ziggs+sona+malphite, while malphite is nice his contribution to damage on higher modes as far as im aware is more than sona/ziggs but still.... lacking in areas

people that suck in general seem to be queing tonight, idk give it a few days or run with people you know cuz these randoms are actually worse than the night it released.

since i know people might actually sit here and read this.

LEARN THE BOSS MECHANICS!

1. when you see dark circles under people get the hell away from eachother.

2. after the shadow balls he will do 1 of 2 abilities that i am aware of the first one being the most common is him zapping the ground with electric beams thatll wipe you out pretty fast.

the second one being a targeted skill, when he starts shooting orbs a line to the player hes targeting will appear at that players feet, they control where the orbs are, the angle of them where they move etc...., it has infinite range as far as im aware so dont try to out run it and sit still, just try to side step and dodge it.

3. ive seen this a few times during the boss on captain and onslaught take to long to kill him and he puts what im going to call string on you.

i do not know the counter of get close or run away, either way every time i have seen it, its meant death for the entire team

4. save your dashes untill its truly needed, taunting/caging him doesnt really affect his abilitys since even while caged with jinxs E he can still dash around as if nothings bothering him, the only stun that actually works to my knowledge is yasuos

try to side step everything if possible

5. dont get overwhelmed, dont be afraid to kill monsters if your teams dps is a bit slow

> after the shadow balls he will do 1 of 2 abilities that i am aware of 

Shadow Kayn= Projectile bullet hell

Raasht=ground effect AOE spam.

I know you already knew the moves just wanted to tell you which Kayn does what so it's even easier to predict.

I played up to Captain difficulty and was able to learn and win after a few tries because of the smooth difficulty curve from Intro to Captain (Cadet - 1 try, Crewmember - 3 tries, Captain 2 tries). Then I got to Onslaught, thinking it would be the next step up in difficulty, but I have played 7 games of it and have not been able to even get passed the first stage of the mission (with gold and diamond players on my team) because of how the extreme the difficulty spike is. I hope Riot will reassess this and either make the game playable or, at least, rework the associated missions so they can be completed on any difficulty.
Onslaught difficult is worlds apart from captain. Its not about whether you play with diamonds or not, its about whether rng favours you that game or not, or thats how it appears to me. I hate rng.
i reached kayn twice and we died.

The first and second stages are aids and so is shadow assassins kayn. I legit have to go into onslaught and see whether the first stage's rng favours me or not. If it doesn't then we lose or i ff and do it all over again. Only shadow kayn in phase 3 is a problem.
No
hmmm lets see. You've lost 13 onslaughts in a row and haven't won yet.
U still bad fam?
No, Ive done all the missions but still doesn't change my mind that onslaught has some absolutely retarded rng

Well... there is about 30 onslaught without one success. Have no idea how to improve the chances, always different team, always different people. As it looks like this option is for people who have their team and can try several times all the tactics, not for random guy who tries something new.
 I guess it's enough to stop trying.
yep you definitely need a group. I played over 60 games with the same people and finally did it after ffing if we get bullshit rng.

I like it being this insane. Each time my team has gotten past the first round (and to the last Kayne form) it's because we were just as ridiculous as them. Did it with a malphite who would just collect all the enemies toward me, and then I would just press R (as Yasuo) over and over until they all died, it was glorious. And then, Did an Onlsaught run with all Yasuos, and BOOOOOOOOOY was that a fucking trip. We still lost, but damn was that shit fun. 

Souyegadon motherfuckers.

Its hard.

That's the point.
Its not that its hard, its that its bullshit rng. I dont care if it was hard but everything wasn't so bullshit.

Well it's sure hard , but believe me it's way much easier than the Star Guardian mode onslaught , in the sg mode we could never take something like augments , and we could only take the strong champions once , Like taking Ahri , Lux , Syndra was actually trolling and if you did then you aren't even thinking about winning , you could only win by spamming ad carries with a support or two , MF Ezreal Jinx , + Soraka Janna , however in thise mode you can take 
 3 Yasuos and and 2 Sonas

SG Onslaught was secretly nerfed without an announcement. I did it on multiple accounts and halfway through the event, the damage you took was significantly less after all the outcries about it being too hard

without atleast 3 yasuos with the same augments its impossible to beat onslaugth difficulty with 2/3 augments :)
5 man yasuo team with the augment that makes you do 50 tornadoes, and them coming back is the only way. + full life steal build
Then you agree that its unfair that theres a mission for an all ziggs or all sona comp. These missions are a joke honestly
